attributes.action: Let parents choose if they feel safe to send their children to school /COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Allow parents to decide especially those with children with medical condition or vulnerable family members. Learning from home is not making children uneducated but putting a whole family true hospital and even losing a family member in front of their eyes has more long lasting devastating effect.
attributes.background: Allow parents to decide if they feel safe to send their children to school with increasing numbers of COVID 19 . Protect especially children with medical conditions and children from vulnerable family members and protect teachers and their families.
